title: President Trump Announces Presidential Delegation to Australia to Attend the Invictus Games Sydney 2018 – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
October 16, 2018
President Trump Announces Presidential Delegation to Australia to attend the Invictus Games Sydney 2018President Donald J. Trump today announced the designation of a Presidential Delegation to Australia to attend the Invictus Games Sydney 2018.The Honorable Mark T. Esper, Secretary of the United States Army, will lead the delegation.Members of the Presidential Delegation:General Paul Selva, Vice Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of StaffMr. James Carouso, Chargé d’Affaires ad interim, United States Embassy CanberraMs. Jacquelyn Hayes-Byrd, Acting Assistant Secretary for Human Resources and Administration, Department of Veterans AffairsMs. Jane Horton, Senior Advisor, Department of Defense
